title: Pokémon TCG Live coming to iOS in limited beta ahead of global release
content:
After delaying the public beta of Pokémon TCG Live last November, the Pokémon Company International just announced the game will be available for Canadian players next week.

more…

The post Pokémon TCG Live coming to iOS in limited beta ahead of global release appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After delaying the public beta of Pokémon TCG Live last year, the game will be available for Canadian players starting next week.
